alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 8:57AM CST until March 10 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Kelly`s Lake Lane, 1160N, is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 32.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CST Thursday was 33.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 20.0 feet Sunday, March 19. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 32.3 Thu 7 am CST 30.3 27.6 25.9 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
